games.path: ./Little Girl Mill of a Gingko, The (English).smc
games.desc:
A young girl named Mill embarks on a whimsical, fantasy-driven adventures with her loyal companion â€” a stork. Known for its unique humor and real-time combat, the game features a "fury bar" mechanic, allowing Mill to temporarily gain super strength by transforming into a powerful version of herself, which players can use to defeat various enemies.

If you're interested in unique action RPGs with a humorous edge, Little Girl Mill of a Gingko stands out as a hidden gem on the GP32, blending imaginative design with charming, whimsical gameplay.
